00022 #ifdef _WIN32
00023 #pragma once

00025 
00026 #include <FdoStd.h>
00027 #include <Fdo/Connections/IConnection.h>
00028 #include <Fdo/Commands/ICommand.h>
00029 
00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The FdoICreateLongTransaction interface defines the CreateLongTransaction
00032 /// command which creates a long transaction that is based upon the currently
00033 /// active long transaction. If no long transaction is active, then the long
00034 /// transaction is based upon the root data. Input to the create long
00035 /// transaction command includes a name and description for the new long
00036 /// transaction.
00037 class FdoICreateLongTransaction : public FdoICommand
00038 {
00039     friend class FdoIConnection;
00040 
00041 public:
00042     /// \brief
00043     /// Gets the name of the long transaction to create as a string.
00044     /// 
00045     /// \return
00046     /// Returns the name of the long transaction
00047     /// 
00048     FDO_API virtual FdoString* GetName() = 0;
00049 
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Sets the name of the long transaction to create as a string.
00052     /// 
00053     /// \param value 
00054     /// Input the name of the long transaction
00055     /// 
00056     /// \return
00057     /// Returns nothing
00058     /// 
00059     FDO_API virtual void SetName(FdoString* value) = 0;
00060 
00061     /// \brief
00062     /// Gets the description of the long transaction to create as a string.
00063     /// 
00064     /// \return
00065     /// Returns the description of the long transaction
00066     /// 
00067     FDO_API virtual FdoString* GetDescription() = 0;
00068 
00069     /// \brief
00070     /// Sets the description of the long transaction to create as a string.
00071     /// 
00072     /// \param value 
00073     /// Input the description of the long transaction
00074     /// 
00075     /// \return
00076     /// Returns nothing
00077     /// 
00078     FDO_API virtual void SetDescription(FdoString* value) = 0;
00079 
00080     /// \brief
00081     /// Executes the create long transaction command.
00082     /// 
00083     /// \return
00084     /// Returns nothing
00085     /// 
00086     FDO_API virtual void Execute() = 0;
00087 };
00088 #endif
